definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: We want to eradicate the tumor is impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我們要想根絕腫瘤，是不可能的。

sentences.english: It annihilates the desire to act .
sentences.chinese: 它可以根絕幹某種行動的願望。
